pages.text: Replica of the Orotiagito Blade.$(br2)Since the Orotiagito came into being, there have been many replicas of it.$(br2)In the tail of the great serpent Naga, you may find it.
Find Naga in the forever Twilight Forest, then slay it.
The replica still has Spirit power, which may be due to its hiding in the Naga.$(br2)Before its rust is finally removed, you can hardly reveal its mystery.
